sentences.en: Although Arabic, although the number is numbers are still low.
sentences.cn: 但是, 这篇报道也说到,最近几年,教授外语的公立中小学数量锐减.

sentences.en: Arabic figures which do not align at the base line.
sentences.cn: 不依基线对齐的亚拉伯数字.

sentences.en: He has a good command of English, German, French, Russian, Arabic and even Esperanto.
sentences.cn: 他精通英语、德语、法语、俄语、阿拉伯语乃至世界语。

sentences.en: He helped me with my Iraqi Arabic, and we talked about everything from the regime to soccer to life in the United States.
sentences.cn: 他教了我一些伊拉克阿拉伯语，还和我一起谈天说地——从政权体系到足球，到美国的生活状况。

sentences.en: In short, for each Arabic numeral, there is one, and only one, Roman numeral which maps to it.
sentences.cn: 简而言之，对于每个阿拉伯数字，都有一个且只有一个罗马数字会映射到它。

sentences.en: Possible causes might be too much damping solution or too much gum arabic.
sentences.cn: 可能的成因是水槽液过多,或亚拉伯胶过多.

sentences.en: The number immediately to the left of the decimal point in the Arabic numeral system.
sentences.cn: 是啊,完整的一百一十一键键盘,包含右边的数字键和左边的方向键.

phrases.tran_cn: 阿拉伯树胶；水溶性阿拉伯胶

trans.tran_cn: 阿拉伯（文学）的，阿拉伯语的
trans.tran_en: Something that is Arabic belongs or relates to the language, writing, or culture of the Arabs
the language or writing of the Arabs, which is the main language of North Africa and the Middle East
